thread.title: U.S. East Coast hunkers down for 'bomb cyclone'

title: U.S. East Coast hunkers down for 'bomb cyclone'
text:
U.S. East Coast hunkers down for 'bomb cyclone' 9:09am EST - 00:31 
Heavy snow and high winds pound Atlantic City amid the U.S. East Coast in a weather pattern caused by a rapid and rare sharp drop in barometric pressure known as a 'bomb cyclone.' Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
